Description: Body sherd of Attic red-figured pottery krater; head and shoulders of draped youth to right; inside glazed
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Leiden University, Faculty of Archaeology. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Prins de Jong 1925 / Scherben aus Naukratis: Aus der Sammlung des Universitäts-Professors Dr Fr W Freih von Bissing (p. 65, no. 6)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1123)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: VII.B.6 (cat. no. in Prins de Jong 1925)
